about_the_game:
In the late Eastern Han Dynasty, a mysterious illness ravages the land, bringing continuous disasters and wars. In such dire times, death may seem like a blessing. Enter a girl who claims to be the true Hua Tuo, the renowned physician Zhang Zhongjing who longs for peace, and Dong Feng, the medical master behind Qing Nang Shu and Shanghan Lun. These three individuals, each from different walks of life, unite on a tumultuous journey, their fates intertwined. After enduring great sorrow and sacrifice, can they uncover the truth and stop the mastermind behind the calamities?

Experience a card-driven narrative adventure, engaging puzzle-solving mini-games, and rich lore explanations that delivers a deeply immersive storytelling experience.

Throughout your journey, you will treat a variety of patients and navigate the world of figures like Cao Cao and Yuan Shao, biding your time to unveil the massive conspiracy lurking behind the epidemic.

short_description: Famine and war have ravaged the land, leaving it in ruins. Step into the shoes of three legendary physicians—Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing, and Dong Feng—and harness surgery, potions, and divine powers to restore order, end the chaos, and uncover the conspiracy behind the epidemic.
